body: Lmaoo finally found it been looking for this story for a while. Read this one on fakku years ago but forgot the name and now somehow I stumbled on this. This one is a classic lol.
Yo what? Poor guy, he didnt know why the girl avoiding him, also i dont think thats the first time
Hola amigos y bienvenidos a una nueva entrega de peliculas qls
My taste for mind break balances out my dislike for ntr.

Am I really the only one that was thinking the girls this guy brings over must have all been lacking common sense or something (report the dude to the authorities). The guy needs to find a girl who has some common sense. And the dude do the equation all of your girls left you... why is that!?
 Yes, I get it's a hentai and this is just fap material. But come on...

ugh, this is so F***ing sad
His dad pretty much destroyed his son's love life for his selfish sexual desires.
I would love a continuation where the MC that got cheated on goes crazy from knowing the truth and smack the crap out of his dad.
His dad doing all that is fine if he only does it once, but the fact that he did it multiple times with no guilt at all makes him a horrible person.
Netorare stuff gets me hard as fuck, being that I'm an immoral bull (opposite of a cuck) IRL, but a friend of mine hates this stuff. I think being cheated on left him traumatized. ^___^
